      • connectToDB

                        java.lang.String serverName,
                        java.lang.String user,
                        java.lang.String password)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Connect to the database
        Parameters:
        hostIP - IP address of the SQL database (usually localhost)
        serverName - Database schema name
        user - User that connects to the database
        password - Password used to connect to the data base
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Exceptions of type Exception and SQLException

      • insertToDatabase

        public <T> int insertToDatabase(java.lang.String tableName,
                                java.lang.String[] columnNames,
                                IObjectToPreparedStatementParameters<T> objToPS)
        Insert an entity to a table.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Class type for the entity that matches the table.
        Parameters:
        tableName - Name of the table.
        columnNames - The names of the columns of the table that will have values to be inserted.
        objToPS - An instance of IObjectToPreparedStatementParameters that describes how to insert the object data into a PreparedStatement. Must insert the data in the same order as the column names in the columnNames array.
        Returns:
        Number of records modified (should be 1) or -1 on failure.

      • insertCollection

        public <T> boolean insertCollection(java.lang.String tableName,
                                    java.lang.String[] columnNames,
                                    int count,
                                    IObjectToPreparedStatementParameters<T> objToPS)
        Insert a collection into the database.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Class type for the entity that matches the table.
        Parameters:
        tableName - Name of the table.
        columnNames - The names of the columns of the table that will have values to be inserted.
        count - The number of records to be inserted.
        objToPS - An instance of IObjectToPreparedStatementParameters that describes how to insert the object data into a PreparedStatement. Must insert the data in the same order as the column names in the columnNames array.
        Returns:
        True if number of records affected equals count.

      • insertAndReturnGeneratedId

        public <T> int insertAndReturnGeneratedId(java.lang.String tableName,
                                          java.lang.String[] columnNames,
                                          IObjectToPreparedStatementParameters<T> objToPS)
        Insert an entity to a table and returns its auto-generated id.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Class type for the entity that matches the table.
        Parameters:
        tableName - Name of the table.
        columnNames - The names of the columns of the table that will have values to be inserted.
        objToPS - An instance of IObjectToPreparedStatementParameters that describes how to insert the object data into a PreparedStatement. Must insert the data in the same order as the column names in the columnNames array.
        Returns:
        ID of new record or -1 on failure.

        Parameters:
        id - Primary key for the requested record.
        idFieldName - Name of the field containing the primary key of the table.
        tableName - Name of the table.
        Returns:
        Result set that contains a record with the PK if it is found, otherwise NULL.

                                               java.lang.String conditionValue,
                                               java.lang.String tableName)
        Returns records from the given table with a specific simple condition (string, one column).
        Parameters:
        conditionFieldName - Name of the field containing the condition.
        conditionValue - Value of the condition.
        tableName - Name of the table.
        Returns:
        ResultSet for all records matching the condition.

      • getAll

        public java.sql.ResultSet getAll(java.lang.String tableName)
        Returns all records from the given table.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Class type for the entity that matches the table.
        Parameters:
        tableName - Name of the table.
        rsToObject - An IResultSetToObject that describes how to convert a record to the entity class.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList containing all the records in the database.

      • getSimpleJoinResult

        public java.sql.ResultSet getSimpleJoinResult(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> tableNames,
                                              java.lang.String conditions)
        Returns all records when joining the two tables with the given conditions.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Class type for the entity that matches the table.
        Parameters:
        tableNames - List of all the tables in the join.
        conditions - The conditions of the join operation, for example:
        firstTableName.firstTableId=secondTableName.secondTableId AND secondTabkeName.quantity > 10. Do not include WHERE or ; in the conditions.
        rsToObject - An IResultSetToObject that describes how to convert a record to the entity class.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList containing all matching records from the join result.

      • getJoinResultsWithSelectColumns

        public java.sql.ResultSet getJoinResultsWithSelectColumns(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> tableNames,
                                                          java.lang.String selectColumns,
                                                          java.lang.String conditions)
        Returns all records when joining the two tables with the given conditions.
        Parameters:
        tableNames - List of all the tables in the join.
        selectColumns - Which columns from the join result to return.
        conditions - The conditions of the join operation, for example:
        firstTableName.firstTableId=secondTableName.secondTableId AND secondTabkeName.quantity > 10. Do not include WHERE or ; in the conditions.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList containing all matching records from the join result.

      • updateById

        public <T> boolean updateById(int id,
                              java.lang.String idFieldName,
                              java.lang.String tableName,
                              java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> keys,
                              IObjectToPreparedStatementParameters<T> objToPS)
        Updates a single record in the database by its PK.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The class of the entity to update.
        Parameters:
        id - Primary key of the record.
        idFieldName - Name of the primary key field in the table.
        tableName - Name of the table in the schema.
        keys - Names of the fields that need updating.
        objToPS - An instance of IObjectToPreparedStatementParameters that describes how to insert the object data into a PreparedStatement. Must insert the data in the same order as the objects in the keys list.
        Returns:
        True if the record was successfully updated.

      • updateById

        public boolean updateById(int id,
                          java.lang.String idFieldName,
                          java.lang.String tableName,
                          java.lang.String updatedColumnName,
                          java.lang.String updatedColumnValue)
        Updates a single record in the database by its PK.
        Parameters:
        id - Primary key of the record.
        idFieldName - Name of the primary key field in the table.
        tableName - Name of the table in the schema.
        updatedColumnName - Name of the column that contains the value that needs to be updated.
        updatedColumnValue - The new value of the column.
        Returns:
        True if the record was successfully updated.

      • updateAllMatchingCondition

        public <T> boolean updateAllMatchingCondition(java.lang.String conditionFieldName,
                                              java.lang.String conditionValue,
                                              java.lang.String tableName,
                                              java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> keys,
                                              IObjectToPreparedStatementParameters<T> objToPS)
        Updates records in the database matching the condition set as the last parameter in the PreparedStatement prepared by the IObjectToPreparedStatementParameters.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The class of the entity to update.
        Parameters:
        conditionFieldName - Name of the field where the condition must match.
        conditionValue - Value of the condition.
        tableName - Name of the table.
        keys - Names of the fields that need updating.
        objToPS - An instance of IObjectToPreparedStatementParameters that describes how to insert the object data into a PreparedStatement. Must insert the data in the same order as the objects in the keys list.
        Returns:
        True if any records were updated.
